page.title: 06Egton Youth Club
page.content:
**{Egton Youth club}**
Mr. Keith Harrison restarted the youth club in 1977, 8 years ago after Mr. and Mrs. Wills finished running it.
In 1978 they started annual outings to Butlins until it closed in 1983, instead they now go to{Lightwater {Valley}.Other trips include{Billingham {Forum}for Swimming and Ice-skating.
There are 35 members of the youth club, 15 seniors (over 16) and 20 juniors, who pay 15p and 10p a week.
Activities include : Snooker, Pool, Badmington, Netball, Hockey,Football, Table tennis and darts.
By Sarah Clark
